scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin main.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/main.html && usemin cart.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/cart.html && usemin homedecor.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/homedecor.html && usemin automotive.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/automotive.html && usemin electronics.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/electronics.html && usemin fashion.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/fashion.html && usemin outdoor.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/outdoor.html && usemin handmade.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/handmade.html && usemin pet.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/pet.html
